column4: hi guys. could someone help me with remapping "back" button on mouse, to act like middle mouse button?
do you still want middle to be middle?
it's logitech mx air and technically it does not have middle
and this "back" button acts like "back" (in browsers for example) by default out of the box.
thanks for help! on webstie, which you gave me, i found btnx tool for mouse keys mapping. it works. thanks!
